mapper.update:
update KQDS_SOUND_RECORD
linenum = #{linenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phonenumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datedir = #{datedir,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recordtime = #{recordtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_SOUND_RECORD set linenum = #{linenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phonenumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datedir = #{datedir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recordtime = #{recordtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.*, u.usercode, u.username from KQDS_SOUND_RECORD b left join KQDS_USERDOCUMENT u on u.phonenumber1 = b.phonenumber where 1=1 and b.seq_id = #{_parameter}
